Job Title: Software Development Engineer - Test - Automation Testing
Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities- Min 2+ years of experience in automating Web application which is development driven.- Must be Expert in web automation framework: Selenium- Should possess Strong Programming Fundamentals.- Expert in Automating web applications using selenium with Java and Node JS.- Experience in API Test Automation.- Performed Automation Testing of Rest API using RestAssured Framework.- Tested REST API's of application and automated using Selenium.- Should be able to conduct code review, able to pinpoint logical issues in code under test, should be able to create test case scripts and their execution should be able to do Unit Level testing as per the need of the Project/ Product development.- Detail-oriented with strong analytical, communication, problem-solving, and organizational skills.- Developed, documented, and maintained detailed test cases, user scenarios, and test artifacts.- Should have worked in BDD environment as SDET.
UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization, BCA in Computers, B.Sc in Any Specialization
